attributes.action: Outlaw  Members of parliment from selling there memoirs when they leave office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's are voted in by the public and given then chance to serve those people. It is offencive for higher members of parliment such as the PM  to them make millions of pounds from there stories or to make money from public speaking. The public demand that public service is none profit from the day they take office untill the day they pass away.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
